channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Mexico jail officer accused of orchestrating attacks on inmates, report says
item.description: An officer at a New Mexico county jail has been accused of orchestrating attacks on two inmates who suffer from mental illness.

item.title: Jim Donovan, Cleveland Browns play-by-play announcer and TV sports anchor, dies of cancer at 68
item.description: Jim Donovan, the beloved radio play-by-play announcer for the Cleveland Browns and a TV sports fixture for more than four decades, died Saturday. He was 68.

item.title: Florida woman found guilty of murder for leaving her boyfriend to die in a suitcase
item.description: A woman accused of leaving her boyfriend to die after he was zipped into a suitcase in their home has been found guilty of second-degree murder by a jury in central Florida.
